Html:
I am localizing a WPF application.  I am going to have a LOT of resources so I'd like to break them up into several resource files.  However, when referencing a resource in a XAML window, for instance, I don't want to have to know which resource file to reference for a given resource.  Is it possible to combine resource files at runtime and then have the UI refer to ALL resources in the same manner?

Thanks.
